website_summaries.verdict: A fantastic alternative to ordinary replaceable filters that you'll be able to wash and reuse over and over again.
pros: Filters well and washes clean with minimal effort
cons: Some reports of damaged filters on arrival

customer_reviews.title: Air-Care Electrostatic permanent washable
customer_reviews.text: I ordered (2) of these filters...They are so flimsy made if you took a hose to clean them, they would literally come out of the frame. I called Air Care and asked about this and I was told the best way to clean would be put in your bath tub and let the shower clean them???
customer_reviews.author: sowhat

customer_reviews.title: Works well! Saves a bunch of money!
customer_reviews.text: I’ve installed a few of these in the different home that I have. They work just as good as the paper filters and help save a bunch of money. I have really bad seasonal allergies and have noticed these filters help subside my symptoms just as well as the expensive paper allergen filters. Cleaning is easy and I find I have to clean these filters far less than replacing a paper filter.
customer_reviews.author: Charles E. Smith III

customer_reviews.title: Works fantastic!! Removes heavy smoke from CA fires!
customer_reviews.text: Love, love this filter!! We have been covered in smoke from the fires in California and this filter has cleaned the air in my house! Neighbors are complaining of the smell as it has been very unhealthy. I didn’t have any headaches or smell indoors!!
customer_reviews.author: Suzanne

customer_reviews.title: Great Filter
customer_reviews.text: Replaced my old “throwaway” filters with this one. I change out two filters every six months so I decided to purchase this permanent one. Easy to clean and is “electrostatic” and seems to catch more airborne debris.
customer_reviews.author: Carson

customer_reviews.title: Louder
customer_reviews.text: I love that its permanent. It is quite noisy though when the air comes on and goes off. You can hear it hit when it gets sucked up and then when it falls back when the air stops. a cardboard one cannot be heard
customer_reviews.author: Therese B

customer_reviews.title: Works well! Easy to clean!
customer_reviews.text: I don't have a lot of other filters to compare this two. But it is catching a TON of dust. I have this in a two start air scrubber in my woodshop. It cleans our quickly and easily with an air compressor or a hose.
customer_reviews.author: Alex W.Top Contributor: Pets

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy
customer_reviews.text: These are super sturdy, and do a great job! And made in the us
customer_reviews.author: Daniel Dickerson

customer_reviews.title: Size
customer_reviews.text: The filter is great but it is about an inch short in width. We had to put a blocker in and rubber tabs on the bottom so it didn't move. The next size up that we could have purchased was too wide but this one will do.
customer_reviews.author: Carole H.

customer_reviews.title: These are great if you wash them often
customer_reviews.text: I M not disciplined enough to wash these as much as you need to.
customer_reviews.author: Josh Wright

customer_reviews.title: have used them before great product
customer_reviews.text: sturdy,cleanable and well made, not like the flimsy cardboard products---more costly but if cleaned last a long time
customer_reviews.author: Richard R.

customer_reviews.title: Great Product
customer_reviews.text: Really truly helped my allergies. Is easy to clean, Great product!
customer_reviews.author: jj

customer_reviews.title: Really works!
customer_reviews.text: This filter works great. We could tell a difference as soon as it was installed.
customer_reviews.author: Pat

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: Seems to be working well so far. Have yet to clean it, so we will see how that goes.
customer_reviews.author: EDDIE SIMPSON

customer_reviews.title: Only one youwill ever need last a life time
customer_reviews.text: This was an awesome purchase it is very well made and so easy to clean
customer_reviews.author: BILL 8255

product_meta.title: Air-Care Electrostatic, Permanent, Washable - For Furnace or AC - Never Buy Another Air Filter! (14x24x1)
product_meta.description: Size:14x24x1Air-Care electrostatic air filters are 10 times more efficient than the standard disposable filter. By switching to a permanent electrostatic furnace filter, the air inside your home will be cleaner and fresher. Our furnace filters are electrostatically charged to trap up to 88% of the dust and allergens in your home. Just easily wash the filter every 1-3 months and put it back in place. The sturdy metal frame will stand the test of time. With a lifetime warranty and 100% money back guarantee, why not make the switch to a permanent air filter? Electrostatic Air Filters clean the air by using static electricity, a safe, naturally occurring phenomenon. An electrostatic charge is generated by air flowing through a maze of static prone fibers. Airborne particles are attracted and held by the static charge until released by washing. All Air-Care Electrostatic Air Filters contain an EPA registered anti-microbial material to inhibit mold and bacteria growth on the air filter surface. The air you breathe contains many irritants such as pollen, dust, bacteria, mold spores, pet dander and smoke. Most of these particles are smaller than one micron. Our Electrostatic Air Filters are an effective and efficient way to reduce the number of these particles in your air. This illustration shows the typical dust loading pattern of the electrostatic fibers. This unique characteristic improves air flow while providing maximum filtration ✔ Cleaner air to breathe ✔ No harmful ozone emissions ✔ Removes pollen, dust and airborne particles ✔ High dust holding capacity ✔ Less housecleaning ✔ Never needs replacing.
feature_bullets: Traps 88% of airborne dust and allergens
Permanent & Washable - Just hose off and reinstall
Anodized frame with a durable and attractive finish
Self-charging electrostatic filter media - does not require electricity
Made in USA with a premium quality extruded aluminum
